title: Rock
description:
A large rock the size of a small rock. May be considered a boulder, a rock, a stone, a pebble, or a piece of dirt. The scale and meaning are context dependent.

The color is gray or brownish gray.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the rock emoji presents as a substantial, weathered boulder with a variegated gray and brown texture, conveying a sense of solid permanence. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and subtle shading give it a realistic, tactile appearance, as if plucked from a mountainside. This emoji on Apple devices often symbolizes strength, stability, or a difficult obstacle.
